title: Harris calls letting Biden decide 2024 run 'recklessness' in new book
shortDescription: Kamala Harris says in her new memoir that it was a mistake to leave the decision up to former President Joe Biden on whether to run in 2024.

title: 'Heart of the Youth': Trump, Vance react to death of Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and other major leaders issued outpourings following the shooting of conservative youth leader Charlie Kirk.

title: A Trump third term? Two Supreme Court justices sound skeptical
shortDescription: Two Supreme Court justices suggested recently that President Donald Trump is probably prohibited by the Constitution from running for a third term.

title: Trump assassination attempt trial: Jury chosen, opening statements set
shortDescription: Twelve jurors and four alternates were chosen to decide the fate of Ryan Routh, who is accused of attempting to assassinate President Donald Trump.

title: Ousted FBI leaders sue Kash Patel, Trump administration over firings
shortDescription: Former acting FBI Director Brian Driscoll Jr., Steven Jensen and Spencer Evans allege in the suit they were targets of politically motivated retribution.

title: Rosie O'Donnell misses daughter's graduation due to Trump feud
shortDescription: Rosie O'Donnell missed her daughter's college graduation due to security concerns over her public feud with President Donald Trump.

title: Barron Trump not attending classes in New York this fall, reports say
shortDescription: Barron Trump appears to be missing from NYU's New York campus this fall. Reports say he is doing a semester elsewhere. Here is what we know.

title: 'Here we go!' Trump reacts to Russian drones shot down over Poland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reacted to Russian's drone incursion into Poland's airspace with a brief post on social media that said, "Here we go!"

title: 'Personally objectionable:' Anthony Bourdain video on Trump resurfaces
shortDescription: President Donald Trump ate at a Washington, DC, restaurant on Sept. 9. An old interview with Anthony Bourdain about Trump resurfaced online.

title: Trump's 30-day takeover of the DC police is ending. What's next?
shortDescription: Trump's 30-day public emergency declaration in Washington DC is set to expire after Sept. 10, but the National Guard will remain.

title: Oliver North marries ex-White House secretary Fawn Hall
shortDescription: Oliver North, the retired Marine Corps lieutenant colonel involved in the Iran-Contra scandal, married his former White House secretary, Fawn Hall.

title: Kamala Harris says 'recklessness' drove silence on Biden in 2024
shortDescription: In her memoir, “107 Days,” Harris explains why she deferred to Joe Biden on his reelection bid and rips his inner circle.

title: Trump comes face to face with protesters at local restaurant in D.C.
shortDescription: A group of protesters confronted Trump at a local restaurant in D.C., chanting “free Palestine” and calling Trump the “Hitler of our time.”

title: Judge keeps Lisa Cook at Fed as Trump appeals, urges lower interest
shortDescription: A federal judge temporarily blocked Trump from firing Lisa Cook from the Fed as he pushes for lower interest rates. The Justice Department appealed.
